enchantment.description: The enchantment to apply to the entity.
enchantment.markdownDescription: The enchantment to apply to the entity.

item_condition.description: If set, the modifier(s) will only apply to items that meet this condition.
item_condition.markdownDescription: If set, the modifier(s) will only apply to items that meet this condition.

modifier.description: If set, this modifier will apply to the entity's enchantment levels for the enchantment specified by the `enchantment` field.
modifier.markdownDescription: If set, this modifier will apply to the entity's enchantment levels for the enchantment specified by the `enchantment` field.

modifiers.description: If set, these modifiers will apply to the entity's enchantment levels for the enchantment specified by the `enchantment` field.
modifiers.markdownDescription: If set, these modifiers will apply to the entity's enchantment levels for the enchantment specified by the `enchantment` field.

type.description:

Modifies the entity's enchantment levels.

Type ID: `apugli:modify_enchantment_level`
